education.degree: B.Tech Computer Science and Engineering (Specialization- AI)
Class XII PCM with Computer Science

projects.title: Research Paper - CipherCraft: An Integrated Approach to Cryptographic Data Security in Modern Computing Environments
projects.description: Explored various cryptographic algorithms, random number generators, and discrete mathematical concepts, applying them to develop robust encryption systems.

projects.title: Research Paper - Advancing Early Diagnostic Accuracy for Alzheimer Disease Through the Integration of Machine Learning and Deep Learning Paradigms by Applying Multisource Datasets
projects.description: Developed and optimized predictive models, including neural networks and ensemble methods. Involved feature selection, hyperparameter tuning, and validation of these models to ensure robust performance.

projects.title: Cars Design Generation Using GANs
projects.description: Transforms the car prototyping landscape by utilizing the transformative potential of Style GANs, in conjunction with unsupervised representation learning and a DCGAN implementation in TensorFlow.

projects.title: Anti-Spoofing Fake Face Detection Over Cam Using A.I
projects.description: Employs Python, OpenCV2, TensorFlow (Keras), HTML/CSS, and Flask to safeguard against facial spoofing. Leverages AI to detect authentic faces over camera feeds, enhancing security.

projects.title: Legal Statements Classification Using BERT Model LLMs
projects.description: Utilizes BERT model language models to categorize statements. Powered by Python, this project enhances natural language understanding for accurate and context-aware statement classification.

projects.title: 3D Object Detection Using Sobel Algorithm and YOLOv8
projects.description: Utilizes Python, OpenCV2, TensorFlow (Keras), HTML/CSS, and Flask. The Sobel algorithm enhances image frames, feeding into the YOLOv8 model for real-time 3D object detection. Features include Sobel edge enhancement, YOLOv8 speed and accuracy, and dynamic object tracking.

certificates: AWS Academy Graduate - AWS Academy Machine Learning Foundations
